title: IE40012: Analytical Instrumentation - Quick Facts
text:
IE40012
Course name | Analytical Instrumentation
Offered by | Instrumentation Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Statistical interpretation of measurement data; Gas analysis: Gas Chromatograph, Thermal conductivity method, heat of reaction method, Estimation of oxygen, hydrogen, methane, carbon dioxide, carbon monoxide etc. in gas mixtures; Measurement of Quality of Air and Water; Nucleonic Instrumentation; Ultrasonic techniques; Mass Spectrometer, IR and UV spectroscopy, X-ray Spectroscopy; NMR, ESCA techniques.
